answers.text: @unabia800 Hi, thanks for checking out our page. FXTM is a regulated and licensed broker authorized to operate across multiple jurisdictions. We are regulated by the Financial Services Commission of the Republic of Mauritius, we have a superb industry reputation and our core values are trust and commitment, which is why all our client funds are held in segregated. Send us a message on our live chat now by clicking the support button on our website’s bottom right corner. Our support team will be more than happy guide you through our services.

text: We want an Islamic account free of usury when you close the deal for a long time so that we can copy the deals of your professional traders

answers.text: @abd_o578 Hello, thank you for your comment. Please be informed that we offer swap free (Islamic) accounts only for Muslim clients and residents of Muslim countries, and this option is not available for MT5 accounts. Once swap free option is enabled in your MyFXTM account, you would be able to make your live trading account swap free. Please go to the My Accounts section of MyFXTM for it, then - to Account Overview > green arrow next to "Deposit" and click "Enable swap-free mode". Swap free option is available for 2, 4,7 or 10 days, depending on trading instrument you are trading. If you keep positions open more than the swap free allowance days, swap free fee (daily fee) will be charged. You can find full details for each instrument on our Contract Specifications page of our website - by clicking on a particular instrument and checking the Swap Free Fee and Swap Free days allowance sections. If you have more questions regarding FXTM trading services, just send us a Direct message - and we will answer them all and guide you through the process step by step.
